
# European option

## Initial state

The updater has no initial state.

## Arguments

|   | name   | description   |
|---|--------|---------------|
| 0 | strike |               |
| 1 | type   | 0-call, 1-put |

## References

|   | name   | description   |
|---|--------|---------------|
| 0 | underlying | underlying process S |
